query.createCommunityOperationPost: insert community_operation_post ( voting_srt_date, voting_end_date, title, contents_hash, writer_addr, is_voting_yn, file_hashs, app_id, preview_text, type, cre_datetime ) values (?)
query.selectCommunityOperationPostList: select cop.community_operation_post_no, cop.voting_srt_date, cop.voting_end_date, cop.title, cop.contents_hash, cop.writer_addr, cop.is_voting_yn, cop.file_hashs, cop.app_id, cop.preview_text, cop.type, date_format(cop.cre_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') cre_datetime, date_format(cop.upd_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') upd_datetime, ui.user_name, ui.user_profile_hash from community_operation_post cop inner join user_info ui on cop.writer_addr = ui.user_addr
query.selectMaxCommunityOperationNo: select max(cop.community_operation_post_no) community_operation_post_no from community_operation_post cop
query.conditionTitleUserName: where cop.title like ? or ui.user_name like ?
query.orderByVotingEndDateDesc: order by cop.is_voting_yn desc, cop.voting_end_date desc, cop.cre_datetime
query.updateCommunityOperationPost: update community_operation_post set contents_hash = ?, file_hashs = ?, preview_text = ?, upd_datetime = ? where community_operation_post_no = ?
query.changeCommunityOperationPostInfo: update community_operation_post set is_voting_yn = 'n' where voting_end_date = ?
